config.generic.hypixel.tooltip: A section dedicated to hypixel minigames
config.generic.hypixel.section.show_bow_: Renders a line showing the trajectory of the bow
config.generic.hypixel.murder_mystery.in:
Highlights all detected murders.
The detection fires when they equip a murder item.
config.generic.hypixel.murder_mystery.mu: Highlights all players you need to kill
config.generic.hypixel.murder_mystery.sh: Forces the client to render name tags
config.generic.hypixel.murder_mystery.hi: Hides the banner bestowed on you upon death

Makes players that have equipped their bow
once glow with a blue color
Makes gold ingots on the ground glow
